name: ExerciseTimer
0:
”Alexa, open Exercise Timer.”
”Start a medium routine.”
”Start a long routine in continuous mode.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: exercise timer
des:
Exercise Timer can be used as a standard exercise timer, an interval timer, or a counter.

Supported Routines
- Standard Routines ("Routine"): each exercise comes in 15 seconds, 30 seconds, or 60 seconds duration
- Interval Routines: each exercise consists of a work period and a rest period in support of interval training, such as Tabata
- Counter Routines: each exercise can count up to 100

**Features**
- All routines come with presets so you can get started right away with popular duration
- All routines are customizable
- All routines support Continuous mode
- Remembers your custom routine so you can quickly start it next time

Presets
With presets, you can quickly start an exercise program with 1 set of 4 exercises.
- Short presets: each exercise is ~15 seconds, or ~15 seconds work/rest (interval), or count to 15 (counter)
- Medium presets: each exercise is ~30 seconds, or ~30 seconds work/rest (interval), or count to 30 (counter)
- Long presets: each exercise is ~60 seconds, or ~60 seconds work/rest (interval), or count to 60 (counter)

Continuous mode
All routines support continuous mode where all exercises in a set run continuously without prompts. There will still be a prompt before the next set. To use any routine in continuous mode, add the word “continuous” to the routine name.

Customizable
You can define the number of sets and the number of exercises and specify your own count or your own work/rest period. To customize any routine, add the word “custom” to the routine name.

After you have configured any custom routine, you can quickly start it next time, just say: "start my routine."

You can customize duration for exercises in standard routine to: Short (~15 seconds), Medium (~30 seconds), Long (~60 seconds)
You can customize soundtrack for presets and standard routines to: Calm, Upbeat, Energetic, Silence, or Random

**Disclaimer**:
Timers are approximates. Use of the Exercise Timer skill is solely at your own risk.

**Support**

Here's some of the commands you can use with the Exercise Timer skill:

Preset routines
To start a preset routine, just add the word “short”, “medium”, or “long” to routine name:
- "start a short routine"
- "start a medium interval routine"
- “start a long counter routine”

Customizable Routines
To customize any routine, just add the word “custom” to routine name:
- "start a custom routine"
- "start a custom counter routine"
- "start a custom interval routine"

Continuous Mode
To start any routine or presets in continuous mode, add the word “continuous” to routine name:
- "start a short continuous routine"
- "start a medium continuous interval routine"
- "start a custom routine in continuous mode"
- "start a custom counter routine in continuous mode"
- "start a custom continuous interval routine"

Saved Custom Routine
To start the most recently configured custom routine:
- "start my routine"

Default exercise duration
To customize the default exercise duration:
- "update duration"
- "change duration to Long"

Default exercise soundtrack
To customize the default soundtrack:
- "update soundtrack"
- "change background to Random"

**Attributions**
